game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, humanity teeters on the brink of collapse.
game.ending: Players must band together to reclaim and master magical energy, restoring balance to the realm.
game.synopsis: The land was once filled with wondrous magical energies that brought prosperity and harmony. However, an enigmatic force known as 'The Devourer' has consumed these energies, leaving behind a barren and dying world. Players take on the roles of 'Wielders,' individuals who possess the ability to harness and wield magical energy.
game.title: Realms of Elyria
